text: The is a museum run by the soy sauce manufacturer Kikkoman inside its factory near Nodashi Station in Noda, Chiba, Japan. The museum offers soy sauce production process information and the history of soy sauce, as well as factory tours. Aromas can be smelled throughout the vicinity. An offsite stockhouse is also available for viewing. The separate city museum also has soy sauce tools on display. ==References== ==External links== * Company virtual museum Category:Museums in Chiba Prefecture
title: Kikkoman Soy Sauce Museum
